definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially
tip/end/final stage/latter part/inessential detail/powder/dust/opera role of old man

sentences.english: Re-entry "scale and scope of the" reading "Economic Observer".
sentences.chinese: 重新《南方周末》《经济观察报》的阅读。

sentences.english: This editorial was published on February 12 in Southern Weekly.
sentences.chinese: 这评论原在2月12日的南方周末上刊登。

sentences.english: I went to Southern Weekly's Beijing bureau yesterday to celebrate its 25th anniversary.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我去南方周末北京记者站参加25岁生日的聚会。

sentences.english: Marriage laws should not provide exceptions to the civil code, Mr. Yang said.
sentences.chinese: 他在南方周末辩护道，婚姻法不应该给民法提供例外。

sentences.english: This Southern Weekly reporter also had some chats with the workers during meal times.
sentences.chinese: 南方周末的记者在吃饭的和工人闲聊。

sentences.english: So far, the liberal Guangdong paper Southern Weekend has scored a coup in publishing excerpts of Zhu's speeches.
sentences.chinese: 目前，《南方周末》成功发表了朱的讲话摘录。

definition: Wen Wei Po (Hong Kong newspaper)/Wenhui News (Shanghai newspaper)
Newsweek magazine/also written 新聞周刊|新闻周刊
Sohu, Chinese web portal and online media company
evening newspaper/(in a newspaper's name) Evening News
Legal Daily, newspaper published by PRC Ministry of Justice
